title: Large apartment near Cambridge||1bdr available||Flexible lease
posting_body: Please follow the link to view full 3D and application: <URL>
Two bedrooms available in a 4 bed 1 bath high quality Somerville apartment!
Fantastic work from home location with relatively easy access to the city!
Union Square with a 20 minute walk to Central, or a bus connection to get directly to Downtown Boston.
Flexible lease terms with only $400 security deposit and minimum of 4 month leases.
Prices for each room (labeled on floor plan) are:
Stylish kitchen with checked tile floors and walk in pantry
Large separate living room area with big bay windows
Hardwood floors throughout the apartment and bedrooms
